fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack someone, douse them, and poison them.
- Roleblock someone, hex them, and cover them in frost.
- Redirect someone, frame them, and attack their visitors.
- Heal someone, purge them, and give them a Basic autovest.
**Swirling Mirage** â€” Use all of your other abilities twice each at once, ignoring their cooldowns.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with zero charges of Swirling Mirage. Whenever a Coven member dies or leaves the Coven, you gain one charge. You may only gain up to two charges per game.
- All non-attacking players who visit you are secretly redirected to themselves.
- Each of your abilities other than Swirling Mirage has a two-night cooldown.
- If you have the Necronomicon, your abilities no longer have coolwdowns and you gain two charges of Swirling Mirage. Additionally, increase all attacks you deal, including through poison and frost, to Powerful.
